If you don't want people in the [edev] usergroup to be able to see the nodes that are created of that type, you'll have to edit [List Nodes of Type] (superdoc).
There are essentially three different permissions:

  • nobody can view (even admins) (useful for things like writeups and e2nodes, of where a zillion exist)
  • only admins can view
  • only editors can view (but not [edev])
  • everybody can view (note: 'everybody' in this last case actually only means people in the edev group, since everybody else is not allowed to view the entire node)

If you just want to let everybody view the list of nodes with that type, you can skip this step.
